message.raw: Change braking strategy to using stop_cfm, prevents drift by large braking torques.  Needs tuning, notes marked under TODO in DRCVehiclePlugin::UpdateStates.  Also added brakePedalUpperDeadBand and brakePedalLowerDeadBand, hardcoded to 5 percent of brake pedal range.
